data.text: Makafu wò, O! Yehowa,
Dzi adzɔm, eye matso aseye le mewò;
Nye futɔwo trɔ megbe;
Elabena wòe xɔ nye nya,
Èka mo na dukɔwo, eye nètsrɔ̃ ame vɔ̃ɖiwo hetutu
Tsɔtsrɔ̃ mavɔ va futɔ la dzi,
Yehowa aɖu fia tegbetegbe;
Adrɔ̃ ʋɔnu xexea me le dzɔdzɔenyenye me;
Yehowa nye sitsoƒe na ame siwo wote ɖe anyi
Ame siwo nya wò ŋkɔ la aɖo dzi ɖe ŋuwò,
Midzi kafukafuhawo na Yehowa,
Elabena eya, ame si biaa hlɔ̃ hlɔ̃dolawo la,
O Yehowa, kpɔ ale si nye futɔwo le yonyeme tim ɖa!
be maɖe wò kafukafu afia le Zion Vinyɔnu ƒe agbowo me,
Dukɔwo ge dze do si woawo ŋutɔ woɖe la me;
Yehowa ɖe eɖokui fia to eƒe ʋɔnu dzɔdzɔe dɔdrɔ̃ me;
Ame vɔ̃ɖiwo gbugbɔ yi yɔ me,
Ke womaŋlɔ hiãtɔ be ɖikaa
Tso, O Yehowa! Mègana amegbetɔ naɖu dzi o,
O! Yehowa, ƒo wo ƒu anyi kple ŋɔdzi;
